column2: Judge denies Redstone granddaughter's bid to join competency suit LOS ANGELES
column3: April 20 A California judge on Wednesday rejected a bid by Sumner Redstone's granddaughter to join the media mogul's ex-girlfriend in a lawsuit that challenges the 92-year-old billionaire's mental competency.

column2: U.S. lawmakers may ask Air Force to look at restarting F-22 production WASHINGTON
column3: April 20 A U.S. congressional committee is planning to ask the Air Force to assess the cost and feasibility of restarting production of Lockheed Martin Corp's F-22 fighter jet in the face of greater security threats around the world.
